TopicTitle: What is this? The popping out messages about recovery of part

Articles.Content:
![FD8976B85AF223DA5925445C447647AB265A5C8F](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/448456655767407017/FD8976B85AF223DA5925445C447647AB265A5C8F/)

It showing that i need part have 1200 parts in 500 stages (Sic!) 

But i never build behemoth like that, and all my kerbonauts are in astronauts center and boring because i not send them on any mission for a while

this parts to recover pop-up very often some time cover the screen, it very annoying ![:mad:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_angry.gif)

I use following MODS

Gemini from 

[http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/230467-corvus-a-small-two-kerbal-pod](http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/230467-corvus-a-small-two-kerbal-pod)
